title: Courgette and goats cheese salad

For the dressing: a few leaves fresh mint, chopped
a few sprigs fresh oregano, chopped (optional)

steps: Wash, dry and cut up all the vegetables into good sized chunks. Cut the goats' cheese into smaller chunks.
Shake the ingredients for the dressing in a jar, and pour over the vegetables. Toss well. Sprinkle over the pine nuts and serve.
